sourcesContent:
export default {
  root: {
    height: '25%',
    width: '20%',
    margin: '0 auto',
    display: 'inline-block',
    position: 'relative',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    marginBottom: '-3.5px',
  },
  boxContent: {
    position: 'absolute',
    padding: '10px',
    width: '100%',
    left: '0',
    bottom: '0',
    color: 'black',
    letterSpacing: '1px',
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
    fontSize: '12px',
    display: 'flex',
    justifyContent: 'space-between'
  },
}
